SELECT products.product_id as product_id, product_name, price, comment, products.genre_id as genre_id, genres.genre_name as genre_name, version, products.created_at, sum(stock_cnt) as stocks, sum(order_cnt) as orders FROM products LEFT OUTER JOIN genres ON products.genre_id = genres.genre_id INNER JOIN stocks ON products.product_id = stocks.product_id INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id

AND products.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, comment = #{comment}, genre_id = #{genre.genreId}, version = version + 1, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = now() WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND version = #{version}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products ( product_name, price, comment, genre_id, version, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{price}, #{comment}, #{genre.genreId}, 1, now(), null )
